SummaryEnglish: Lion Games' Korean online role-playing game Soul Worker is inspiring an anime that will be streamed online. The publisher NHN PlayArt made the announcement at a press conference marking the completion of the game. The press conference showed an animatic preview and the storyboards for the anime.(Source: ANN, edited)

1.SummaryEnglish: Haru and Lilly battle merciless demons in an abandoned mansion. As countless beasts block their path, something tremendously powerful comes to the aid of the two SoulWorkers...

2.SummaryEnglish: Two more SoulWorkers have appeared to assist in the destruction of the summoner responsible for demonic mannequins: Erwin and Stella.

3.SummaryEnglish: The demons have suddenly disappeared and the four SoulWorkers continue their mission. In doing so, they uncover something shocking in the abandoned mansion.

4.SummaryEnglish: A dark abyss reveals itself in the former research laboratory of the NED Company â€“ experiments so terrible, they never should have been allowed to take place. Whilst the SoulWorkers take in their surroundings, they do not realise that they are being watched...

5.SummaryEnglish: A tremendous being has awoken and pushes the SoulWorkers to the limits of their strength. Can they bring it to its knees?
